Description:
The FHIR Immunization resource provides a patient's immunizations, including vaccine and vaccine administration details.

The read interaction allows a client to retrieve an Immunization resource by a constant server ID. This allows clients to store only the server ID and retrieve the most up-to-date vaccine and administration information for an immunization with a single request.

A user or staff member accessing this FHIR resource must have access to patient immunizations.
SampleResponse:
<Immunization xmlns="http://hl7.org/fhir">

<id value="ehw95dkN3LeP0tQqmm8Y2XQ3"/>

<extension url="http://hl7.org/fhir/4.0/StructureDefinition/extension-Immunization.isSubpotent">

<valueBoolean value="true"/>

</extension>

<identifier>

<use value="usual"/>

<system value="urn:oid:1.2.840.114350.1.13.861.1.7.2.768076"/>

<value value="49020"/>

</identifier>

<status value="completed"/>

<notGiven value="false"/>

<vaccineCode>

<coding>

<system value="http://hl7.org/fhir/sid/cvx"/>

<code value="110"/>

</coding>

<coding>

<system value="http://hl7.org/fhir/sid/ndc"/>

<code value="1350600000"/>

</coding>

<text value="DTaP"/>

</vaccineCode>

<patient>

<reference

value="https://hostname/instance/api/FHIR/STU3/Patient/eNzTT5oTjKCVXqmpOhY-5nw3"/>

<display value="Seeger, Marty"/>

</patient>

<date value="2019-03-20"/>

<primarySource value="true"/>

<location>

<display value="SAM Clinic 5"/>

</location>

<manufacturer>

<display value="Berlex"/>

</manufacturer>

<lotNumber value="5"/>

<expirationDate value="2024-03-20"/>

<site>

<coding>

<system value="urn:oid:1.2.840.114350.1.13.861.1.7.10.768076.4040"/>

<code value="11"/>

<display value="Left quadriceps"/>

</coding>

<text value="Left quadriceps"/>

</site>

<route>

<coding>

<system value="urn:oid:1.2.840.114350.1.13.861.1.7.10.768076.4030"/>

<code value="2"/>

<display value="Intramuscular"/>

</coding>

<text value="Intramuscular"/>

</route>

<doseQuantity>

<value value="0.5"/>

<unit value="mL"/>

<system value="urn:oid:1.2.840.114350.1.13.861.1.7.10.768076.4019"/>

<code value="1"/>

</doseQuantity>

<practitioner>

<role>

<coding>

<system value="http://hl7.org/fhir/v3/0443"/>

<code value="AP"/>

<display value="Administering Provider"/>

</coding>

<text value="Administering Provider"/>

</role>

<actor>

<reference

value="https://hostname/instance/api/FHIR/STU3/Practitioner/ef81ZrgFqs7ufzYI2X9ixcA3"/>

<display value="User, Epic"/>

</actor>

</practitioner>

<practitioner>

<role>

<coding>

<system value="http://hl7.org/fhir/v3/0443"/>

<code value="OP"/>

<display value="Ordering Provider"/>

</coding>

<text value="Ordering Provider"/>

</role>

<actor>

<reference

value="https://hostname/instance/api/FHIR/STU3/Practitioner/eNE.QLNPXbfJ.JrPUGj5oOQ3"/>

<display value="Holiday, Doc"/>

</actor>

</practitioner>

<note>

<text value="243987efhksdjf comment"/>

</note>

</Immunization>

date.Name: date
date.Description: Vaccination administration date and time (if available).

doseQuantity.Name: doseQuantity
doseQuantity.Description: Information about the amount of vaccine administered.

unit.Name: unit
unit.Description: Unit of amount of vaccine administered.

encounter.Name: encounter
encounter.Description: Reference to the Encounter resource in which this immunization took place.

reasonNotGiven.Name: reasonNotGiven
reasonNotGiven.Description: Why immunization did not occur. Only sent if 'NotGiven' is true.

isSubpotent.Name: extension
isSubpotent.Description: Indicates that the dose wasnâ€™t full strength.

display.Name: display
display.Description: Name of location where vaccination occurred.

profile.Name: profile
profile.Description: Available in Netherlands environments only. This environment shows that this API conforms to the profile connected to the following canonical url: http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/zib-Vaccination

notGiven.Name: notGiven
notGiven.Description: Flag for whether the immunization was given.

patient.Name: patient
patient.Description: Reference to the Patient who was immunized.

practitioner.Name: practitioner
practitioner.Description: Reference to a Practitioner that participated in the Immunization and the role they played in the interaction.

actor.Name: actor
actor.Description: Reference to a Practitioner that participated in the Immunization

role.Name: role
role.Description:
The role the Practitioner played in the immunization. Possible values include:

  • Administering Provider (AP)
  • Ordering Provider (OP)

primarySource.Name: primarySource
primarySource.Description: Whether the immunization data is historical and therefore reported by a patient or another system. If historical, "false" is returned as this system is not the primary source of the data.

route.Name: route
route.Description: How the vaccine entered the body.

site.Name: site
site.Description: Body site where the vaccine was administered.

status.Name: status
status.Description:
Status of the Immunization. Possible values are:

  • completed
  • entered-in-error

*Note: deferred and incomplete Immunizations are not returned.

coding.Name: coding
coding.Description: Vaccine code. Includes CVX and NDC codes.
